member.name: T:Team1Project.Controllers.GithubApiController
member.summary: Controller that performs api requests on Github's public API to extract specific data from an intern's github profile.

member.name: M:Team1Project.Controllers.GithubApiController.GetNumberOfRepos(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns the number of public repositories of an intern's github profile. The intern is selected based on its id.
member.returns: An integer representing the number of public repositories.

member.name: M:Team1Project.Controllers.GithubApiController.ListRepos(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of urls to each public repository found on an intern's github profile. The intern is selected by its id.
member.returns: List of string urls, each representing a repository.

member.name: M:Team1Project.Controllers.GithubApiController.GetUserCommits(System.String)
member.summary: Computes the number of commits made by a github user on public repositories during the current year.
member.returns: An integer representing the number of repositories
